title: ILIFE Clean
description: ILIFECleanApp is a mobile phone application of connecting the intelligent robotic products, which supports the robotic customization products with WIFI function under the ILIFE brand. It can not only replace the traditional remote controller , but also can present more working data that cannot be displayed by the conventional remote controller. Through the APP, the user can remotely control and reserve robots for cleaning while away from home, making you to enjoy smart life anytime, anywhere.
descriptionHTML: ILIFECleanApp is a mobile phone application of connecting the intelligent robotic products, which supports the robotic customization products with WIFI function under the ILIFE brand. It can not only replace the traditional remote controller , but also can present more working data that cannot be displayed by the conventional remote controller. Through the APP, the user can remotely control and reserve robots for cleaning while away from home, making you to enjoy smart life anytime, anywhere.
